aiofauna.client module

class aiofauna.client.APIClient(base_url: str, headers: ~typing.Dict[str, str] = <factory>, _subclasses: ~typing.List[~typing.Type[~aiofauna.client.APIClient]] | None = None, _session: ~aiohttp.client.ClientSession | None = None)[source]

Bases: LazyProxy[ClientSession]

HTTP Client: Base class to create HTTP clients that wrap aiohttp.ClientSession. Provides Lazy Loading through proxy objects and session reuse using the singleton pattern. Constructor Signature: base_url (str): Base URL of the API. For example: https://api.openai.com. Must the an absolute URL. headers (dict): Headers that will proxide the authentication credentials, content_type, etc.

base_url: str
